bug.author: csukuangfj
bug.summary: [doc] dead link in "Build and load a SavedModel"
bug.description:
System information
TensorFlow version: master Doc Link: https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/saved_model
Describe the documentation issue The link <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/guide/serving/serving_basic>https://www.tensorflow.org/tfx/guide/serving/serving_basic</denchmark-link> for "TensorFlow serving" is no long available in the doc <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/saved_model#build_and_load_a_savedmodel>Build and load a SavedModel</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/csukuangfj>@csukuangfj</denchmark-link> Correct two links are not working.
First "Tensorflow Serving" in this section . -- this is what you found. "instructions" in this section. Thanks for pointing them. We will take care of them. Thanks!
Both fixes are in the source files, there will be some delay to push to the site.
